basicInfo.name: Leo
basicInfo.flavor: After losing to Yuri, Leo met Kris, who offered him tremendous power. He's now returned to the desert to seek revenge against the Foxes.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Slice and Dice
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 230% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 270% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 39%.

Skill 2.name: Lion's Roar
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Damage Reduction to 13%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Life Drain. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Beastly Endurance
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Death Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Death Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants All Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 24% All Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: After losing to Yuri, Leo met Kris, who offered him tremendous power. He's now returned to the desert to seek revenge against the Foxes.

basicInfo.name: Leo
basicInfo.flavor: Leo finally succeeded in taking over Blazing Desert to become its ultimate ruler. Creatures residing in Blazing Desert obey his commands out of fear and respect.

All Allies

basicInfo.name: Leo
basicInfo.flavor: Leo is a vicious hunter who relentlessly pursues his prey until he catches and kills it. His insatiable appetite always leaves him hungry for more.
